title: Time
content:
The below is an evolving thought process on how to deal with information aging out in machine learning models.

Information aging out for learning (human and machine) requires thinking about the problem space from two different angles:
1.) Embeddings
2.) Weights / Models

Of which there are three scenarios:
1.) Explicitly dated information
2.) Implicity dated information
3.) Undated information

Of sources across a different set of vectors:
a.) Mostly Trusted
b.) Untrusted
